about_the_game:
All songs by Chris Parrello except for De Lune, by Chris Parrello and Julia Haltigan.

Piano performed by Huizi Zhang.

Jim Orso, percussion (Storm Face, Ziggurat, Race, Ship Shop, Citizens Into The Abyss, Vestiges); Ian Young, saxophone (Ziggurat); Curtis Stewart, violin, and Zac Colwell, flute (Tad Mol Peephole). Production and tracking with vires on Fanfare.

Solo piano tracking with Ryan Streber at Oktaven Audio, Mount Vernon, NY.
De Lune instrumental tracking with vires, vocal tracking with NIEVERGELT at Orangefish Studio, Brooklyn. Storm Face, Ziggurat, Jupiter, and Promise Ring (Arrangement #1) tracked with Craig Dreyer at Mighty Toad Studio, Brooklyn.
Storm Face, Ziggurat, Jupiter, and De Lune mixed by NIEVERGELT at Orangefish Studio, Brooklyn.
Storm Face, Ziggurat, Jupiter, De Lune, Promise Ring (Arrangement #1), and Untitled 3 (Trailer) mastered by Scott Hull at Masterdisk.
detailed_description:
All songs by Chris Parrello except for De Lune, by Chris Parrello and Julia Haltigan.

Piano performed by Huizi Zhang.

Jim Orso, percussion (Storm Face, Ziggurat, Race, Ship Shop, Citizens Into The Abyss, Vestiges); Ian Young, saxophone (Ziggurat); Curtis Stewart, violin, and Zac Colwell, flute (Tad Mol Peephole). Production and tracking with vires on Fanfare.

Solo piano tracking with Ryan Streber at Oktaven Audio, Mount Vernon, NY.
De Lune instrumental tracking with vires, vocal tracking with NIEVERGELT at Orangefish Studio, Brooklyn. Storm Face, Ziggurat, Jupiter, and Promise Ring (Arrangement #1) tracked with Craig Dreyer at Mighty Toad Studio, Brooklyn.
Storm Face, Ziggurat, Jupiter, and De Lune mixed by NIEVERGELT at Orangefish Studio, Brooklyn.
Storm Face, Ziggurat, Jupiter, De Lune, Promise Ring (Arrangement #1), and Untitled 3 (Trailer) mastered by Scott Hull at Masterdisk.
